original_title: ど田舎の夏はヤルことがなくて隣の美人奥さんの誘惑に乗っかり毎日じっとり汗だく交尾 星宮一花
overview: Eitaro, who grew up in the city, will spend his summer vacation in the countryside where his uncle lives, partly because he can avoid crowds at the suggestion of his worried parents. It was hot in the summer in the countryside surrounded by mountains and rice fields. 2 hours by car to the convenience store. The radio waves are not stable, so I can't watch videos, and the nearest neighbor's house is also a 30-minute walk away. It's been 2 days since I came here without any stimulation, but I'm bored because I haven't done anything anymore... Except for the fact that the young wife next door was a sex monster...
title: There’s Nothing To Do In The Countryside In Summer So I Gave In To The Neighbour’s Pretty Housewife’s Attempts To Seduce Me – Ichika Hoshimiya
